revision.comment: remove extraneous spaces at end of line; add missing final period (full stop) in 'From ...' line
revision.text: {{also|Yama|yamá|yàmá}} ==Bukiyip== ===Pronunciation=== * {{IPA|ape|[jæmə]}} ===Noun=== {{head|ape|noun}} # [[mother]] ===References=== * 2007. [http://archive.phonetics.ucla.edu/Language/APE/ape.html The UCLA Phonetics Lab Archive]. Los Angeles, CA: UCLA Department of Linguistics. {{C|ape|Family members|Female|People}} ---- ==Ibanag== ===Etymology=== From {{inh|ibg|map-pro|*amax}}. ===Noun=== {{head|ibg|noun}} # [[father]] ====Coordinate terms==== * {{l|ibg|yena}} ---- ==Jamamadí== ===Noun=== {{head|jaa|noun}} # {{lb|jaa|Banawá}} [[thing]] ===References=== * 2007. [http://archive.phonetics.ucla.edu/Language/BNH/bnh.html The UCLA Phonetics Lab Archive]. Los Angeles, CA: UCLA Department of Linguistics. ---- ==Japanese== ===Romanization=== {{ja-romaji}} # {{ja-romanization of|やま}} ---- ==Javanese== ===Romanization=== {{jv-rom}} # {{romanization of|jv|ꦪꦩ}} ---- ==Papiamentu== ===Etymology=== From {{der|pap|es|llamar}} and {{der|pap|pt|chamar}}. ===Verb=== {{head|pap|verb}} # to [[call]] (shout) # to be [[called]] (one's name) # to [[call]] by telephone ---- ==Phuthi== ===Etymology=== {{rfe|bnt-phu}} ===Verb=== {{bnt-phu-verb|yáma}} # to [[touch]] ====Inflection==== {{rfinfl|bnt-phu}} ---- ==Tagalog== ===Etymology 1=== ====Noun==== {{tl-noun|yamá}} # {{lb|tl|archaic}} [[duty]] or [[responsibility]] ===Etymology 2=== ====Noun==== {{tl-noun|yamâ}} # {{lb|tl|archaic}} [[touch]]; [[sense]] of [[touch]] ---- ==Turkish== ===Etymology=== From {{inh|tr|ota|یامه|tr=yama}}, ultimately from {{inh|tr|trk-pro|*yama-|t=to patch}},<ref>{{R:tut-pro:SDM|*jama-|url=https://starling.rinet.ru/cgi-bin/response.cgi?single=1&basename=%2fdata%2falt%2fturcet&text_number=1063&root=config}}</ref> whence also {{cog|tr|yamamak|yama-|t=to patch}}. {{rel-top|cognates}} Cognate with {{cog|xqa|tr=jamaγ|t=patch}}; {{cog|kk|жамау}}, {{cog|ky|жамоо}}, {{cog|krc|жамау}}, {{cog|kum|ямав|t=patch}}; {{cog|uz|yamoq}}, {{cog|ug|ياماق|t=patch}}; {{cog|tk|ýama}}, {{cog|ba|ямау}}, {{cog|az|yamaq|t=patch}}; also {{cog|sah|самалык||patch}}. {{rel-bottom}} ===Noun=== {{tr-noun|yı|lar}} # [[birthmark]] # [[patch]] # {{lb|tr|computing}} [[patch]] # {{lb|tr|film}} [[reprint]], [[slug]], [[build-up]] # {{lb|tr|surgery}} [[graft]] ====Declension==== {{tr-infl-noun-v|ı|poss=1}} ====Derived terms==== {{der3|tr|yamacı|yamalamak|yamamak}} ====See also==== * {{l|tr|ben}} * {{l|tr|leke}} ===References=== <references/> ---- ==Yoruba== ===Etymology=== {{bor+|yo|ha|yamma}}. ===Pronunciation=== *{{yo-IPA|yámà}} ===Noun=== {{yo-noun|yámà}} # [[west]], [[sunset]] #: {{syn|yo|ìwọ̀-oòrùn}} {{C|yo|Compass points}}
